name: RN apps: Delete reply in reply thread view

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes: Linda 22 Aug 2022: Added RN_Smoke_Tests label during test case cleanup.

inline.description:
Delete reply in reply thread view
————————————————————————————
  1. Post a message
  2. Reply to that message
  3. From that view, long press the reply and select Delete
  4. Tap to confirm delete
inline.expectedResult: • Reply disappears, parent post is still there, still viewing reply thread
